itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: David "Dai" Royston "Roy" Bevan (2 January 1928 – 12 April 2008) was a Welsh rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1950s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Oldham RUFC, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Great Britain and Wales, and at club level for Wigan (Heritage № 536), and Halifax (Heritage № 652), as a wing, i.e. number 2 or 5.
